attributes.action: GIVE US A REFERENDUM on whether or not the 15 year old executioner of Mrs Maguire should be put to death.
attributes.additional_details:
What we want you to do for us is in upper case lettering.  You so often seem unable to identify what it is we want you to do.  We hope this is helpful.

There comes a time when society must demonstrate that a line has been crossed.  THIS IS THAT TIME.  The 15 year old who killed Mrs Maguire should NOT be kept alive - despite our politicians' proclivity towards allowing murderers to have a second go at killing after a short time in prison. LET THE PEOPLE TELL YOU WHAT WE WANT YOU TO DO WITH THIS LOWLIFE.
